forge/scripts/upload_to_huggingface.py.summary: {"purpose": "Manages the upload of model weights, GGUF files, and metadata to Hugging Face Hub (Phase 6). Handles artifact selection, repo creation, and secure transport via hf_utils.", "layer": "Curate / Deployment", "usage": ["python forge/scripts/upload_to_huggingface.py --repo user/repo --gguf --readme", "python forge/scripts/upload_to_huggingface.py --files ./custom_model.bin --private"], "args": ["--repo: HF Repo ID", "--files: Explicit file paths", "--private: Mark repo as private", "--gguf: Upload GGUF artifacts", "--modelfile: Upload Ollama Modelfile", "--model-card: Upload model_card.yaml", "--lora: Upload LoRA adapter directory"], "inputs": ["forge/config/upload_config.yaml", "models/gguf/*", "huggingface/README.md"], "outputs": ["Uploaded artifacts on Hugging Face Hub"], "dependencies": ["mcp_servers.lib.hf_utils", "mcp_servers.lib.env_helper", "mcp_servers.lib.logging_utils"], "key_functions": ["load_config()", "load_environment()", "perform_upload()", "main()"], "consumed_by": ["Forge Pipeline", "Manual deployment"]}

mcp_servers/lib/env_helper.py.summary: {"purpose": "Simple environment variable helper with proper fallback (Env -> .env). Ensures consistent secret loading across Project Sanctuary with priority: 1) Environment variable, 2) .env file in project root, 3) Error or None.", "layer": "Core / Utility", "usage": ["from mcp_servers.lib.env_helper import get_env_variable", "token = get_env_variable('HUGGING_FACE_TOKEN', required=True)"], "args": [], "inputs": [".env"], "outputs": ["Environment variable value"], "dependencies": ["python-dotenv", "mcp_servers.lib.path_utils"], "key_functions": ["get_env_variable(key, required)", "load_env()"], "consumed_by": ["mcp_servers.lib.hf_utils", "forge/scripts/upload_to_huggingface.py", "All services needing secrets"]}

mcp_servers/lib/hf_utils.py.summary: {"purpose": "Hugging Face utility library for soul persistence (ADR 079). Encapsulates huggingface_hub logic for Bicameral Separation. Provides unified async primitives for uploading snapshots, semantic caches, learning history, JSONL training data, and manifest updates.", "layer": "Retrieve / Curate (Library)", "usage": ["from mcp_servers.lib.hf_utils import upload_soul_snapshot", "from mcp_servers.lib.hf_utils import upload_semantic_cache", "from mcp_servers.lib.hf_utils import sync_full_learning_history"], "args": [], "inputs": [".agent/learning/snapshots/*", ".agent/learning/rlm_summary_cache.json", ".agent/learning/"], "outputs": ["Uploaded artifacts on Hugging Face Dataset Hub"], "dependencies": ["huggingface_hub", "mcp_servers.lib.env_helper"], "key_functions": ["upload_soul_snapshot()", "upload_semantic_cache()", "sync_full_learning_history()", "ensure_dataset_card()", "sync_metadata()", "append_to_jsonl()", "update_manifest()", "ensure_dataset_structure()", "upload_to_hf_hub()", "compute_checksum()"], "consumed_by": ["tools/cli.py persist-soul", "forge/scripts/upload_to_huggingface.py", "scripts/hugging-face/hf_upload_assets.py"]}

Handles content transformation (actor swapping) and file placement.", "layer": "Plugin / Bridge", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/plugin-bridge/scripts/bridge_installer.py --plugin <path> [--target <auto|antigravity|github|gemini|claude>]"], "args": ["--plugin: Path to plugin directory", "--target: Target environment (default: auto)"], "inputs": ["Plugin directory content", "plugin.json metadata"], "outputs": [".agent/workflows/", ".github/prompts/", ".gemini/commands/", ".claude/commands/"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["plugins/plugin-bridge/scripts/install_all_plugins.py", "Manual plugin installation"], "key_functions": ["transform_content", "install_antigravity", "install_github", "install_gemini", "install_claude"]}

plugins/plugin-bridge/scripts/install_al.summary: {"purpose": "Bulk Plugin Installer that iterates through all directories in plugins/ and executes the bridge_installer.py for each, ensuring a full installation of all available plugins.", "layer": "Plugin / Bridge", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/plugin-bridge/scripts/install_all_plugins.py"], "args": [], "inputs": ["plugins/ directory structure"], "outputs": ["Installed plugins in target directories (.agent, .github, etc.)"], "dependencies": ["plugins/plugin-bridge/scripts/bridge_installer.py"], "consumed_by": ["Manual setup", "CI/CD"], "key_functions": ["main"]}

plugins/spec-kitty/scripts/speckit_syste.summary: {"purpose": "The Universal Bridge Synchronization Engine. Reads Spec Kitty definitions from .windsurf/workflows and .kittify/memory (Source of Truth) and projects them into native configurations for Antigravity, Claude, Gemini, and GitHub Copilot.", "layer": "Plugin / Spec-Kitty / Bridge", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/spec-kitty/scripts/speckit_system_bridge.py"], "args": [], "inputs": [".windsurf/workflows/*.md", ".kittify/memory/*.md"], "outputs": [".agent/workflows/", ".agent/rules/", ".claude/commands/", ".claude/CLAUDE.md", ".gemini/commands/", "GEMINI.md", ".github/prompts/", ".github/copilot-instructions.md", ".kittify/config.yaml"], "dependencies": ["toml", "yaml"], "consumed_by": ["Manual sync", "Workflow automation"], "key_functions": ["setup_directories", "ingest_rules", "ingest_workflows", "sync_antigravity", "sync_claude", "sync_gemini", "sync_copilot", "update_kittify_config"]}

plugins/spec-kitty/scripts/sync_skills.p.summary: {"purpose": "Synchronizes skill directories from .agent/skills/ to the native skill locations expected by each AI agent (Claude, Copilot). Also handles cleanup of old injected blocks in config files.", "layer": "Plugin / Spec-Kitty / Bridge", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/spec-kitty/scripts/sync_skills.py --all", "python3 plugins/spec-kitty/scripts/sync_skills.py --clean"], "args": ["--all: Copy ALL skills to native directories", "--clean: Only remove old injected blocks"], "inputs": [".agent/skills/"], "outputs": [".claude/skills/", ".github/skills/"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["speckit_system_bridge.py", "Manual sync"], "key_functions": ["clean_injected_blocks", "copy_skills", "main"]}

plugins/spec-kitty/scripts/sync_workflow.summary: {"purpose": "Synchronizes custom workflow definitions from .agent/workflows/ to other agent configuration directories (Claude, Copilot, Gemini). Handles format conversions (e.g., Markdown to TOML for Gemini).", "layer": "Plugin / Spec-Kitty / Bridge", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/spec-kitty/scripts/sync_workflows.py --all"], "args": ["--all: Sync workflows to agent directories"], "inputs": [".agent/workflows/"], "outputs": [".claude/commands/", ".github/prompts/", ".gemini/commands/"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["speckit_system_bridge.py", "Manual sync"], "key_functions": ["transform_content", "sync_recursive", "sync_workflows", "main"]}

plugins/spec-kitty/scripts/verify_bridge.summary: {"purpose": "Audits the Universal Bridge Synchronization by verifying that artifacts from the Source of Truth (.windsurf, .kittify) are correctly projected into target agent directories (.agent, .claude, .gemini, .github). Checks for file existence and content transformations.", "layer": "Plugin / Spec-Kitty / Verification", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/spec-kitty/scripts/verify_bridge_integrity.py"], "args": [], "inputs": [".windsurf/", ".kittify/", ".agent/", ".claude/", ".gemini/", ".github/"], "outputs": ["Console integrity report"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["Manual verification", "CI/CD"], "key_functions": ["Verifier.check_file_exists", "Verifier.check_content", "main"]}

plugins/spec-kitty/scripts/verify_workfl.summary: {"purpose": "Validates that valid Spec-Driven Development (SDD) artifacts (spec.md, plan.md, tasks.md) exist and are in the correct state for a given phase (specify, plan, tasks, review).", "layer": "Plugin / Spec-Kitty / Verification", "supported_object_types": ["SDD Artifacts"], "usage": ["python3 plugins/spec-kitty/scripts/verify_workflow_state.py --phase <phase> [--feature <slug> | --wp <WP-ID>]"], "args": ["--phase: Workflow phase (specify, plan, tasks, review)", "--feature: Feature directory slug", "--wp: Work Package ID"], "inputs": ["specs/ or kitty-specs/ directories"], "outputs": ["Console verification report", "Exit code 0 (pass) or 1 (fail)"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["Spec-Kitty Workflows", "CI/CD"], "key_functions": ["verify_specify", "verify_plan", "verify_tasks", "main"]}

plugins/task-manager/scripts/task_manage.summary: {"purpose": "Manages tasks and kanban boards for Project Sanctuary. Supports creating, moving, and listing tasks, as well as generating board visualizations.", "layer": "Plugin / Task Manager", "supported_object_types": ["Task", "Kanban Board"], "usage": ["python3 plugins/task-manager/scripts/task_manager.py [create|move|list|board]"], "args": ["create: New task", "move: Change status", "list: Show tasks", "board: Markdown board"], "inputs": ["tasks/"], "outputs": ["tasks/*.md", "kanban_board.md"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["Manual task management", "Spec-Kitty"], "key_functions": ["create_task", "move_task", "render_board", "main"]}

plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/audit_plu.summary: {"purpose": "Audits the Tool Inventory against the file system and RLM Cache. Checks for missing scripts, orphan entries, and RLM coverage gaps in the plugins/ directory.", "layer": "Plugin / Tool Inventory / Audit", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/audit_plugins.py"], "args": [], "inputs": ["tools/tool_inventory.json", "plugins/ tree", ".agent/learning/rlm_tool_cache.json"], "outputs": ["Console audit report", "Exit code 0 (pass) or 1 (fail)"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["CI/CD", "Manual verify"], "key_functions": ["load_json", "main"]}

plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/cleanup_c.summary: {"purpose": "Removes stale or orphan entries from the RLM Cache and Tool Inventory when files are deleted or moved. Ensures cache hygiene.", "layer": "Plugin / Tool Inventory / Hygiene", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/cleanup_cache.py"], "args": [], "inputs": ["rlm_tool_cache.json", "tool_inventory.json"], "outputs": ["Cleaned cache files"], "dependencies": ["rlm_config.py"], "consumed_by": ["manage_tool_inventory.py", "CI/CD"], "key_functions": ["remove_entry", "clean_orphans", "main"]}

plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/distiller.summary: {"purpose": "The RLM Engine. Performs recursive summarization of repository content using Ollama (or injected summaries). Updates the RLM Cache and triggers inventory updates.", "layer": "Plugin / Tool Inventory / RLM", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/distiller.py --file <path>", "python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/distiller.py --since <hours>"], "args": ["--file: Single file", "--target: Directory", "--model: Ollama model", "--cleanup: Remove stale", "--force: Force regen", "--summary: Inject summary"], "inputs": ["Source code/docs"], "outputs": ["rlm_tool_cache.json", "rlm_summary_cache.json"], "dependencies": ["rlm_config.py", "manage_tool_inventory.py"], "consumed_by": ["manage_tool_inventory.py", "Manual invocation"], "key_functions": ["call_ollama", "distill", "run_cleanup", "main"]}

Provides a user-friendly menu for listing, searching, and updating tools.", "layer": "Plugin / Tool Inventory / UX", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/inventory.py"], "args": [], "inputs": ["tool_inventory.json"], "outputs": ["Console UI"], "dependencies": ["manage_tool_inventory.py", "query_cache.py"], "consumed_by": ["Manual usage"], "key_functions": ["menu_loop", "display_tool", "main"]}

plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/manage_to.summary: {"purpose": "Comprehensive manager for Tool Inventories. Supports list, add, update, remove, search, audit, discovery, and documentation generation for tools.", "layer": "Plugin / Tool Inventory / Curate", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/manage_tool_inventory.py list", "python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/manage_tool_inventory.py add --path <path>", "python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/manage_tool_inventory.py audit", "python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/manage_tool_inventory.py discover --auto-stub"], "args": ["--inventory: Path to JSON inventory", "--path: Tool path", "--category: Category override", "--desc: Description", "--auto-stub: Auto-create stubs", "--batch: Process all stubs", "--dry-run: Preview changes"], "inputs": ["tools/tool_inventory.json", "plugins/"], "outputs": ["Updated tool_inventory.json", "Console reports"], "dependencies": ["distiller.py", "cleanup_cache.py"], "consumed_by": ["Manual management", "CI/CD"], "key_functions": ["InventoryManager.add_tool", "InventoryManager.update_tool", "InventoryManager.remove_tool", "InventoryManager.audit", "InventoryManager.discover_gaps", "InventoryManager.create_stub", "InventoryManager.standardize_header", "main"]}

plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/query_cac.summary: {"purpose": "Provides instant O(1) semantic search of the RLM ledger. Allows searching by term, listing cached files, and outputting results in JSON.", "layer": "Plugin / Tool Inventory / RLM", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/query_cache.py <term>", "python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/query_cache.py --list"], "args": ["term: Search term", "--list: List all cached files", "--no-summary: Hide summary", "--json: Output JSON"], "inputs": [".agent/learning/rlm_tool_cache.json"], "outputs": ["Console search results"], "dependencies": ["rlm_config.py"], "consumed_by": ["Manual search", "Tool discovery"], "key_functions": ["load_cache", "search_cache", "list_cache", "main"]}

plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/rebuild_i.summary: {"purpose": "Complete rebuild of the Tool Inventory from the file system. Scans plugins/ and tools/ to generate a fresh tool_inventory.json, handling categories and descriptions.", "layer": "Plugin / Tool Inventory / Curate", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/rebuild_inventory.py"], "args": [], "inputs": ["plugins/", "tools/"], "outputs": ["tool_inventory.json"], "dependencies": ["manage_tool_inventory.py"], "consumed_by": ["Disaster recovery", "Migration"], "key_functions": ["scan_directory", "rebuild", "main"]}

plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/rlm_confi.summary: {"purpose": "Centralized configuration and utility logic for the RLM Toolchain. Implements the Manifest Factory pattern to dynamically resolve manifests and cache files.", "layer": "Plugin / Tool Inventory / RLM", "supported_object_types": ["RLMConfig"], "usage": ["Imported by other scripts"], "args": [], "inputs": ["manifest-index.json"], "outputs": ["RLMConfig object", "Shared utilities"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["distiller.py", "query_cache.py", "cleanup_cache.py"], "key_functions": ["RLMConfig.__init__", "load_cache", "save_cache", "collect_files", "should_skip", "compute_hash"]}

plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/sync_inve.summary: {"purpose": "Backfills Tool Inventory descriptions using high-quality purpose fields from the RLM Cache. Hydrates manual inventory with LLM-generated insights.", "layer": "Plugin / Tool Inventory / Hygiene", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/sync_inventory_descriptions.py"], "args": [], "inputs": [".agent/learning/rlm_tool_cache.json", "tools/tool_inventory.json"], "outputs": ["Updated tool_inventory.json"], "dependencies": ["manage_tool_inventory.py"], "consumed_by": ["Manual consistency check", "CI/CD"], "key_functions": ["main"]}

plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/tool_chro.summary: {"purpose": "Embedded ChromaDB wrapper for tool-inventory plugin. Provides a dedicated vector store for tool discovery and semantic search over tool summaries without external dependencies.", "layer": "Plugin / Tool Inventory", "supported_object_types": ["Tool Summaries"], "usage": ["python3 plugins/tool-inventory/scripts/tool_chroma.py [stats|list|search|import-json]"], "args": ["stats: Show collection stats", "list: List all entries", "search <query>: Semantic search", "import-json <path>: Import from RLM cache"], "inputs": ["rlm_tool_cache.json"], "outputs": ["ChromaDB persistence directory"], "dependencies": ["chromadb"], "consumed_by": ["manage_tool_inventory.py", "Manual Discovery"], "key_functions": ["upsert", "remove", "search", "list_all", "import_from_json", "main"]}

plugins/workflow-inventory/scripts/workf.summary: {"purpose": "Manages the workflow inventory for agent workflows (.agent/workflows/*.md). Scans workflow files, extracts frontmatter, generates JSON/Markdown inventories, and supports search/list operations.", "layer": "Plugin / Workflow Inventory", "supported_object_types": [], "usage": ["python3 plugins/workflow-inventory/scripts/workflow_inventory_manager.py --scan", "python3 plugins/workflow-inventory/scripts/workflow_inventory_manager.py --search <query>", "python3 plugins/workflow-inventory/scripts/workflow_inventory_manager.py --list", "python3 plugins/workflow-inventory/scripts/workflow_inventory_manager.py --show <name>"], "args": ["--scan: Regenerate inventory", "--search: Search workflows", "--list: List all workflows", "--show: Show workflow details"], "inputs": [".agent/workflows/*.md"], "outputs": ["docs/antigravity/workflow/workflow_inventory.json", "docs/antigravity/workflow/WORKFLOW_INVENTORY.md"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["Manual documentation", "Orchestrator"], "key_functions": ["parse_frontmatter", "scan_workflows", "generate_json", "generate_markdown", "search_workflows", "list_workflows", "show_workflow", "main"]}

scripts/hugging-face/hf_decorate_readme..summary: {"purpose": "Prepares the local Hugging Face staging directory for upload. Modifies hugging_face_dataset_repo/README.md in-place with YAML frontmatter per ADR 081. Creates Hub-standard directory structure (lineage, data, metadata).", "layer": "Curate", "usage": ["python scripts/hugging-face/hf_decorate_readme.py"], "args": [], "inputs": ["hugging_face_dataset_repo/README.md"], "outputs": ["hugging_face_dataset_repo/README.md (Modified with YAML frontmatter)", "hugging_face_dataset_repo/lineage/ (Folder created)", "hugging_face_dataset_repo/data/ (Folder created)", "hugging_face_dataset_repo/metadata/ (Folder created)"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["stage_readme()"], "consumed_by": ["scripts/hugging-face/hf_upload_assets.py", "Manual deployment"]}

scripts/hugging-face/hf_upload_assets.py.summary: {"purpose": "Synchronizes staged landing-page assets with the Hugging Face Hub (ADR 081). Uploads the final, metadata-rich README.md to the repository root. Complements cli.py persist-soul (which handles machine-readable data) by handling human-readable assets.", "layer": "Curate / Deployment", "usage": ["python scripts/hugging-face/hf_upload_assets.py"], "args": [], "inputs": ["hugging_face_dataset_repo/README.md"], "outputs": ["Uploads README.md to Hugging Face Dataset Root"], "dependencies": ["huggingface_hub", "mcp_servers.lib.hf_utils"], "key_functions": ["upload_assets()"], "consumed_by": ["Manual deployment", "Soul Persistence workflow"]}

tools/cli.py.summary: {"purpose": "Main entry point for the Project Sanctuary Command System. Provides unified CLI access to Protocol 128 Learning Loop (debrief, snapshot, persist-soul, guardian), RAG Cortex (ingest, query, stats, cache), Context Bundling (init-context, manifest), Tool Discovery (tools), Workflow Orchestration (workflow), Evolutionary Metrics (evolution), RLM Distillation (rlm-distill), Domain Entity Management (chronicle, task, adr, protocol), and Fine-Tuned Model (forge).", "layer": "Tools / Orchestrator", "usage": ["python tools/cli.py debrief --hours 24", "python tools/cli.py snapshot --type seal", "python tools/cli.py persist-soul", "python tools/cli.py guardian wakeup --mode HOLISTIC", "python tools/cli.py ingest --incremental --hours 24", "python tools/cli.py query \"What is Protocol 128?\"", "python tools/cli.py workflow start --name workflow-start --target MyFeature", "python tools/cli.py workflow retrospective", "python tools/cli.py workflow end \"feat: implemented feature X\"", "python tools/cli.py rlm-distill tools/my-script.py", "python tools/cli.py chronicle list --limit 10", "python tools/cli.py task list --status in-progress", "python tools/cli.py adr list --status proposed", "python tools/cli.py forge status"], "args": ["debrief: Phase I - Run Learning Debrief (--hours)", "snapshot: Phase V - Capture context snapshot (--type: seal/learning_audit/audit/guardian/bootstrap)", "persist-soul: Phase VI - Broadcast learnings to Hugging Face", "guardian: Bootloader operations (wakeup, snapshot)", "ingest: RAG ingestion (--incremental, --hours, --dirs, --no-purge)", "query: Semantic search (--max-results, --use-cache)", "stats: View RAG health (--samples, --sample-count)", "workflow: Agent lifecycle (start, retrospective, end)", "evolution: Evolutionary metrics (fitness, depth, scope)", "rlm-distill: Distill semantic summaries from files", "chronicle/task/adr/protocol: Domain entity CRUD", "forge: Sanctuary Fine-Tuned Model (query, status)"], "inputs": [".agent/learning/learning_manifest.json", ".agent/learning/guardian_manifest.json", "00_CHRONICLE/ENTRIES/", "tasks/", "ADRs/", "01_PROTOCOLS/"], "outputs": ["RAG Database (.vector_data/)", "Snapshots (.agent/learning/snapshots/)", "Context Bundles (temp/context-bundles/)", "Soul traces on Hugging Face", "Chronicle, Task, ADR, Protocol markdown files"], "dependencies": ["mcp_servers/learning/operations.py (LearningOperations)", "mcp_servers/rag_cortex/operations.py (CortexOperations)", "mcp_servers/evolution/operations.py (EvolutionOperations)", "mcp_servers/chronicle/operations.py (ChronicleOperations)", "mcp_servers/task/operations.py (TaskOperations)", "mcp_servers/adr/operations.py (ADROperations)", "mcp_servers/protocol/operations.py (ProtocolOperations)", "mcp_servers/forge_llm/operations.py (ForgeOperations) [optional]", "tools/orchestrator/workflow_manager.py (WorkflowManager)"], "key_functions": ["main()", "verify_iron_core()", "_get_learning_ops()", "_get_cortex_ops()", "_get_evolution_ops()"], "consumed_by": ["User (Manual CLI)", "Agent (via Tool Calls)", "CI/CD Pipelines", "/workflow-* workflows"]}
